DOC.brief_summary: The investigators wish to accumulate initial data on the performance and safety of the Baska mask in paediatric patient population.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study of Baska Mask, a New Supraglottic Airway Device in Children
DOC.criteria: consent BMI 1535 weight over 30kg or age 816 yrs nonurgent surgery of planned duration up to 2 hrs neck pathology previous or anticipated problems with the upper GI or upper airway increased risk of gastric aspiration expected difficult airway
